people_id.description: A people ID to filter the response on

project_id.description: A project ID to filter the response on

phase_id.description: A phase ID associated with a project to filter the response on

task_meta_id.description: A project task ID to filter the response on

start_date.description: Start of date range in format YYYY-MM-DD. Must be used together with `end_date`

end_date.description: End of date range in format YYYY-MM-DD. Must be used together with `start_date`

page.description: The page number of the page of results to return, default `1`

per-page.description: The number of items per page, default is `50`

sort.description: A field to sort the list values in the response, ascending (default), pre-fix `-` to apply descending. (Limited fields, varies per endpoint)

modified_since.description: Datetime in either `YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss` or as a Unix timestamp in seconds to filter on all records with an equal or later `modified` timestamp

fields.description: Comma-delimited set of fields to include in the response
